title: similar font to bauhaus
content:
Hi guys! I have to do a very subtle logo redesign. The wordmark is set in ITC Bauhaus and seems a bit too old fashioned. Does anyone have any suggestions on what typeface I could use which is similar to Bauhaus?

Thanks in advance..  
-mike
author: mikeb7

comments.content: What's the business about? That might make it easier to get suggestions. Maybe something geometric, like Futura or Avenir? Avant Garde is very constructed, but less wierd then Bauhaus.

it's a computer game agency focused on online gaming.  
I've already tried the usual suspects like futura, avenir and so on. it needs to be a bit more unique with a playful touch

Here you are..... this is my absolutely favorite. But last I checked it costed £200! from a 'smaller studio' somewhere in London... they've bought the copyrights to it.
